BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 210259Z JUL
   BY M/V NPS RAMFORM SOVEREING TOWING 14
   8100 METER CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-41.52S 041-50.80W, 25-07.10S 042-58.12W,
   24-01.78S 043-28.42W, 23-36.62S 042-21.30W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 210359Z JUL 12.
